comment.author: 67754144@N06
comment._content: That's right NLI, In the deck chairs are Margaret 'Rita' Fitzgerald nee Foley and her husband Patrick Fitzgerald with two of their children. The other lady is Anastasia Flynn nee Foley, Rita's sister. They had four sons: Tomas was born 1925, Patrick James born 1928, John (my father) born 1932 and Jim born 1935. This photo is one of four in the collection that appear to have been taken at the same sitting. If this is the case, then as one of the photos includes all four boys, the approximate date would be in 1936.
